notfalldatenmodul.name: Anordnungen
notfalldatenmodul.sql:
SELECT n2500pld.srvtxt, pland AS pland, n2500pld.datf, n2500pld.datt, x8201psr.namechr AS namechr, n2500pld.crstat AS state, (select LISTAGG(ftxt,'') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY posno) ftxt from n2991txt where n2500pld.ftxt = 1 and pld = n2991txt.tpk and n2991txt.tab = 'PLD') || '/' || (select LISTAGG(ftxt,'') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY posno) ftxt from n2991txt where n2500pld.cond = 1 and pld = n2991txt.tpk and n2991txt.tab = 'PLD') AS zusatztext, '' AS receiver
FROM n2600mdc JOIN n2500pld USING (pld, pat) JOIN x8201psr ON x8201psr.psr = n2500pld.resp
WHERE pat = :pat AND SYSDATE BETWEEN n2500pld.datf AND n2500pld.datt AND n2600mdc.pland BETWEEN SYSDATE AND SYSDATE + :DaysLookBack
ORDER BY pland, srvtxt
